core:param.value: VAT number should be greater than 1 and less than 30
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: FiscalLocationReference should be in below pattern ([0-9]{9})+|([^^]+ [0-9/]+)
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Post Code should be in the pattern ([0-9]{4}-[0-9]{3})
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Length of the Fax number should be greater than 1 and less than 20
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Length of the Email address should be greter than 1 and less than 254
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Length of the address should be greter than 1 and less than 210
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Length of the province should be greter than 1 and less than 60
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Branch number should not be null
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage
